00005 """Visual Studio project reader/writer."""
00006 
00007 import gyp.common
00008 import gyp.easy_xml as easy_xml
00009 
00010 #------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00011 
00012 
00013 class Tool(object):
00014   """Visual Studio tool."""
00015 
00016   def __init__(self, name, attrs=None):
00017     """Initializes the tool.
00018 
00019     Args:
00020       name: Tool name.
00021       attrs: Dict of tool attributes; may be None.
00022     """
00023     self._attrs = attrs or {}
00024     self._attrs['Name'] = name
00025 
00026   def _GetSpecification(self):
00027     """Creates an element for the tool.
00028 
00029     Returns:
00030       A new xml.dom.Element for the tool.
00031     """
00032     return ['Tool', self._attrs]
00033 
00034 class Filter(object):
00035   """Visual Studio filter - that is, a virtual folder."""
00036 
00037   def __init__(self, name, contents=None):
00038     """Initializes the folder.
00039 
00040     Args:
00041       name: Filter (folder) name.
00042       contents: List of filenames and/or Filter objects contained.
00043     """
00044     self.name = name
00045     self.contents = list(contents or [])
00046

00049 
00050 
00051 class Writer(object):
00052   """Visual Studio XML project writer."""
00053 
00054   def __init__(self, project_path, version, name, guid=None, platforms=None):
00055     """Initializes the project.
00056 
00057     Args:
00058       project_path: Path to the project file.
00059       version: Format version to emit.
00060       name: Name of the project.
00061       guid: GUID to use for project, if not None.
00062       platforms: Array of string, the supported platforms.  If null, ['Win32']
00063     """
00064     self.project_path = project_path
00065     self.version = version
00066     self.name = name
00067     self.guid = guid
00068 
00069     # Default to Win32 for platforms.
00070     if not platforms:
00071       platforms = ['Win32']
00072 
00073     # Initialize the specifications of the various sections.
00074     self.platform_section = ['Platforms']
00075     for platform in platforms:
00076       self.platform_section.append(['Platform', {'Name': platform}])
00077     self.tool_files_section = ['ToolFiles']
00078     self.configurations_section = ['Configurations']
00079     self.files_section = ['Files']
00080 
00081     # Keep a dict keyed on filename to speed up access.
00082     self.files_dict = dict()
00083 
00084   def AddToolFile(self, path):
00085     """Adds a tool file to the project.
00086 
00087     Args:
00088       path: Relative path from project to tool file.
00089     """
00090     self.tool_files_section.append(['ToolFile', {'RelativePath': path}])
00091 
00092   def _GetSpecForConfiguration(self, config_type, config_name, attrs, tools):
00093     """Returns the specification for a configuration.
00094 
00095     Args:
00096       config_type: Type of configuration node.
00097       config_name: Configuration name.
00098       attrs: Dict of configuration attributes; may be None.
00099       tools: List of tools (strings or Tool objects); may be None.
00100     Returns:
00101     """
00102     # Handle defaults
00103     if not attrs:
00104       attrs = {}
00105     if not tools:
00106       tools = []
00107 
00108     # Add configuration node and its attributes
00109     node_attrs = attrs.copy()
00110     node_attrs['Name'] = config_name
00111     specification = [config_type, node_attrs]
00112 
00113     # Add tool nodes and their attributes
00114     if tools:
00115       for t in tools:
00116         if isinstance(t, Tool):
00117           specification.append(t._GetSpecification())
00118         else:
00119           specification.append(Tool(t)._GetSpecification())
00120     return specification
00121 
00122 
00123   def AddConfig(self, name, attrs=None, tools=None):
00124     """Adds a configuration to the project.
00125 
00126     Args:
00127       name: Configuration name.
00128       attrs: Dict of configuration attributes; may be None.
00129       tools: List of tools (strings or Tool objects); may be None.
00130     """
00131     spec = self._GetSpecForConfiguration('Configuration', name, attrs, tools)
00132     self.configurations_section.append(spec)
00133 
00134   def _AddFilesToNode(self, parent, files):
00135     """Adds files and/or filters to the parent node.
00136 
00137     Args:
00138       parent: Destination node
00139       files: A list of Filter objects and/or relative paths to files.
00140 
00141     Will call itself recursively, if the files list contains Filter objects.
00142     """
00143     for f in files:
00144       if isinstance(f, Filter):
00145         node = ['Filter', {'Name': f.name}]
00146         self._AddFilesToNode(node, f.contents)
00147       else:
00148         node = ['File', {'RelativePath': f}]
00149         self.files_dict[f] = node
00150       parent.append(node)
00151 
00152   def AddFiles(self, files):
00153     """Adds files to the project.
00154 
00155     Args:
00156       files: A list of Filter objects and/or relative paths to files.
00157 
00158     This makes a copy of the file/filter tree at the time of this call.  If you
00159     later add files to a Filter object which was passed into a previous call
00160     to AddFiles(), it will not be reflected in this project.
00161     """
00162     self._AddFilesToNode(self.files_section, files)
00163     # TODO(rspangler) This also doesn't handle adding files to an existing
00164     # filter.  That is, it doesn't merge the trees.
00165 
00166   def AddFileConfig(self, path, config, attrs=None, tools=None):
00167     """Adds a configuration to a file.
00168 
00169     Args:
00170       path: Relative path to the file.
00171       config: Name of configuration to add.
00172       attrs: Dict of configuration attributes; may be None.
00173       tools: List of tools (strings or Tool objects); may be None.
00174 
00175     Raises:
00176       ValueError: Relative path does not match any file added via AddFiles().
00177     """
00178     # Find the file node with the right relative path
00179     parent = self.files_dict.get(path)
00180     if not parent:
00181       raise ValueError('AddFileConfig: file "%s" not in project.' % path)
00182 
00183     # Add the config to the file node
00184     spec = self._GetSpecForConfiguration('FileConfiguration', config, attrs,
00185                                          tools)
00186     parent.append(spec)
00187 
00188   def WriteIfChanged(self):
00189     """Writes the project file."""
00190     # First create XML content definition
00191     content = [
00192         'VisualStudioProject',
00193         {'ProjectType': 'Visual C++',
00194          'Version': self.version.ProjectVersion(),
00195          'Name': self.name,
00196          'ProjectGUID': self.guid,
00197          'RootNamespace': self.name,
00198          'Keyword': 'Win32Proj'
00199         },
00200         self.platform_section,
00201         self.tool_files_section,
00202         self.configurations_section,
00203         ['References'],  # empty section
00204         self.files_section,
00205         ['Globals']  # empty section
00206     ]
00207     easy_xml.WriteXmlIfChanged(content, self.project_path,
00208                                encoding="Windows-1252")
